briefTitle: In Situ Comparison of the Remineralization Potential of Optimized Fluoride Dentifrice With Control Fluoride Dentifrice
officialTitle: Comparison of the Remineralization Potential of an Optimized Fluoride Dentifrice With a Control Fluoride Dentifrice Using an in Situ Caries Model

interventions.name: 1100 ppm F as sodium fluoride (positive control)
1100 ppm F as sodium fluoride Test Product

summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the remineralization potential of an optimized fluoride dentifrice to a control fluoride dentifrice in an in situ caries model.

primaryOutcome.timeFrame: at the end of each two-week treatment per

effectByArm.arm: 1100 Ppm F as Sodium Fluoride (Positive Control)
1100 Ppm F as Sodium Fluoride Test Product

commonTop: Erythema buccal mucosa due to cheek bite
